metadata.name: Remote Thread Creation Ttdinject.exe Proxy
metadata.comment: Detects a remote thread creation of Ttdinject.exe used as proxy

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 4 AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\ttdinject.exe')))

output.summary: Detects a remote thread creation of Ttdinject.exe used as proxy
